'''''Spirited Eruption''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. This achievement can be completed in any one of three ways:
* Complete the {{Quest|A Brief History of Rocks}}
* Complete the {{Quest|Investigator of Ancient Ruins}}
* Climb a certain distance up the [[Great Volcano of Tollan]]
